citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to allow access to and accompany inspection at ( 4-3-20142:30 pm,
3-26-2014 3:00 pm. )
Contace me Jerry West with a time someone will normally be available for inspection

narrative:
2.126(a)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
  A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
 
 A responsible adult was not available to allow access to and accompany inspection at ( 4-3-20142:30 pm,
